all.name: Everybody
all.tooltip: Modelers and experimentalists interested in using the Platform's infrastructure and facilities in the most user-friendly way, for relatively simple collaborative scientific projects using GUIs and public HPC resources (such as Cloud Computing, or the Neuroscience Gateway) and/or their own data.

power.name: Power users
power.tooltip: Modelers and/or experimentalists interested in using the Platform infrastructure and facilities for collaborative projects using their own HPC grants (such as PRACE) on one of the supercomputer centers supporting the BSP activities (JSC and CINECA);

experts.name: Experts
experts.tooltip: Users able to understand the inner working of collabs/apps/webservices and contribute to their development

code.name: Code
code.tooltip: Early adopters of initial versions of collabs/apps/webservices

beta.name: Beta
beta.tooltip: A service of this maturity level has reached a certain robustness and may be used by early adopters.

experimental.name: Experimental
experimental.tooltip: A service of this maturity level is under heavy development and recommended only for specialistsâ€™ use or use for co-design partners.

byor.name: BYOR
byor.tooltip: Services of this type allow you to delegate the execution to resources provided by the user. This is subject to technical compatibility
